meanings.definition: A flower or small bouquet worn in the buttonhole of a man's jacket.
meanings.sent1: He proudly displayed a boutonniere on his jacket for the wedding.
meanings.sent2: The groomsmen all wore matching boutonnieres at the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The boutonniere added a touch of elegance to his outfit.
meanings.sent4: The boutonniere was a colorful beacon on his dark suit.
meanings.sent5: The delicate boutonniere brightened up his attire.

meanings.definition: A similar ornament worn by a woman.
meanings.sent1: She pinned a beautiful boutonniere to her dress for the event.
meanings.sent2: The bridesmaids each had a unique boutonniere pinned to their gowns.
meanings.sent3: The oversized boutonniere made her outfit stand out.
meanings.sent4: Her boutonniere was a sparkling accessory that caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of her boutonniere complemented her ensemble perfectly.
